title: Blotter, "Bruynzeel's eenpaneel's deur, februari 1939", 1939
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, mounted on blue blotting paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: An exterior view of two buildings and a tree are reproduced on an interior wall, printed in blue at left. A closed red door is adjacent to the scene. Blue text at right. Calendar printed in red at lower right. Company's name in red across bottom of blotter.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blotter, "Bruynzeel's eenpaneel's deur, februari 1939", 1939.
1939. Off-set lithograph on white wove paper, mounted on blue blotting paper. Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 2004-1-5.
